title: Check this ban out im toxic for saying this
body:
SO please explain what is so so toxic and why i deserve a perma ban for this in each game i asked for my team to stop the bullshit feeding and trolling or to stop arguing and i get flamed and let alone waiste an hour of my life each game lose 15 lp each time.  I get perma banned for exposing the players for what they are and im the one that gets reported and perma banned while they skate off scott free...  I added them just to check to see if they get banned and no i see all three of the players trolling around op.gg'd em still doing the same shit



Game 1
BlackStarSoul: wat late panth
BlackStarSoul: bot lane callyour missing ffs
BlackStarSoul: lol
BlackStarSoul: why go so deep with no wards
BlackStarSoul: ok ziigs no help?? then comes and gives free kill why??
BlackStarSoul: ok rotate and help us
BlackStarSoul: BOT LANE
BlackStarSoul: CALL YOUR FUCKING MIAS AND STOP ARGUING
BlackStarSoul: you are as useless
BlackStarSoul: ziggs your bad be quite
BlackStarSoul: you dont understand roaming or rotations
BlackStarSoul: lol ok
BlackStarSoul: um i did you rather argue with your boyfriend
BlackStarSoul: been bot as i said you cant get along with your supp im not gonna gank your lane
BlackStarSoul: while you sit there and type and fight
BlackStarSoul: with eachother
BlackStarSoul: look at scores
BlackStarSoul: lol
BlackStarSoul: cause you are busy arguing
BlackStarSoul: muted reported
BlackStarSoul: enjoy your ban
BlackStarSoul: lol rubbish feeder mid and bot
BlackStarSoul: yea i did and got a kill
BlackStarSoul: then i soloed morg a second time
BlackStarSoul: i put you and panth ahead and you threw it ziggs
BlackStarSoul: still havent seen you do a single thing trist
BlackStarSoul: go back to bronze plz
BlackStarSoul: yep sit under tower and watch me and panth die
BlackStarSoul: the only 2 on the team actually doing anything
BlackStarSoul: trust shut up
BlackStarSoul: trist
BlackStarSoul: you are bad dont tell anone what to do
BlackStarSoul: um cant ulti when stunned
BlackStarSoul: derp
BlackStarSoul: plz report our bot lane toxic

Game 2
BlackStarSoul: ok bye
BlackStarSoul: troll ass duo
BlackStarSoul: nice support q spamming my minions to steal them aka your duo
BlackStarSoul: annie stop spamming on my minions
BlackStarSoul: plz report annie
BlackStarSoul: plz report annie troll
BlackStarSoul: she refuses to listen i ask her to stop taking/ sapmming to intentionally push my wave out when i dont want it out
BlackStarSoul: all annie is doing is farming bot and intentionally feeding
BlackStarSoul: you would care if it was you
BlackStarSoul: you would be asking for someone to report her as well
BlackStarSoul: its not a treat i am reportng the troll
BlackStarSoul: gj annie feed more
BlackStarSoul: 11 deatrhs from this duo
BlackStarSoul: troll as fuck
BlackStarSoul: no 11 deaths is what im pissed about
BlackStarSoul: plz report jungler and supp
BlackStarSoul: lol look at you dude
BlackStarSoul: sitting there running your mouth and intentionally feeding you and your duo have almost all of ours deaths on purpose
BlackStarSoul: cause you and your jungler are intentionally throwing the game
BlackStarSoul: 16 deaths between the 2 of them
BlackStarSoul: they are intent feeding
BlackStarSoul: lol just end
BlackStarSoul: so i can report the duo trolls
BlackStarSoul: ok i didnt do anything wrong
BlackStarSoul: im not the intent feeder duo

replies.body:
It really is whether or not this should deserve a chat-restriction. Because given the number of punishments you've had in the last month, another recent punishment would be escalated in severity to perma-ban.

Your last punishment was your final warning.

BlackStarSoul 
Riot didn't cut VIDEOGAMEDUNKEY A.K.A MeatWadSprite ( Or w/e it was i forget ) 
One of LoL's more popular youtubers at the time
Any slack so why in the seven hells
Do you think you'd get any different? You broke the rules and thats your own problem

What's really funny is this guy is getting punished for talking out his a$$. But, he didn't call them any derogatory words.  I'd give this guy at least 35 game restriction.  @RiotTantram: I don't want to put any roughness between us. But, given there have been SOME improvements in the community. But, is it really necessary to ban him? What did he do wrong? Get mad at his team.  EVERYONE gets mad at their team man especially if they don't play how they should. If this guy gets a chat restriction then you need to give 96% of the region a restriction.  

#You can restrict my in-game chat if you need to meet your quota.

> [{quoted}](name= THE RHINOCEROS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R6jhjQMg,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2016-05-04T10:44:38.876+0000)
>
> What's really funny is this guy is getting punished for talking out his a$$. But, he didn't call them any derogatory words.  I'd give this guy at least 35 game restriction.  @RiotTantram: I don't want to put any roughness between us. But, given there have been SOME improvements in the community. But, is it really necessary to ban him? What did he do wrong? Get mad at his team.  EVERYONE gets mad at their team man especially if they don't play how they should. If this guy gets a chat restriction then you need to give 96% of the region a restriction.  
> 
> #You can restrict my in-game chat if you need to meet your quota.

I have never seen anyone this bad in a game I have been in. Even when I play poorly. He was very out of line.  And he would have gotten a chat restriction. Except that he was toxic so many times, he went beyond chat restrictions.

First thing's first, this doesn't look bad enough to have escalated from nothing to a permanent ban. Therefore, you've had punishments before, and have probably climbed through the punishment tiers such that your next punishment was going to be a permanent ban. In light of that, the question to ask is "is this behavior worthy of a punishment", not specifically a permaban. 

The answer to that is definitely yes. You're constantly berating and harassing teammates, threatening reports, calling for reports, and being all-around negative. 

Some highlights:

BlackStarSoul: you are as useless
BlackStarSoul: ziggs your bad be quite
BlackStarSoul: you dont understand roaming or rotations

BlackStarSoul: muted reported
BlackStarSoul: enjoy your ban
BlackStarSoul: lol rubbish feeder mid and bot

BlackStarSoul: still havent seen you do a single thing trist
BlackStarSoul: go back to bronze plz
BlackStarSoul: yep sit under tower and watch me and panth die
BlackStarSoul: the only 2 on the team actually doing anything
BlackStarSoul: trust shut up
BlackStarSoul: trist
BlackStarSoul: you are bad dont tell anone what to do

BlackStarSoul: plz report our bot lane toxic

BlackStarSoul: plz report annie
BlackStarSoul: plz report annie troll

BlackStarSoul: gj annie feed more
BlackStarSoul: 11 deatrhs from this duo
BlackStarSoul: troll as fuck
BlackStarSoul: no 11 deaths is what im pissed about
BlackStarSoul: plz report jungler and supp
BlackStarSoul: lol look at you dude
BlackStarSoul: sitting there running your mouth and intentionally feeding you and your duo have almost all of ours deaths on purpose
BlackStarSoul: cause you and your jungler are intentionally throwing the game
BlackStarSoul: 16 deaths between the 2 of them

BlackStarSoul: 16 deaths between the 2 of them
BlackStarSoul: they are intent feeding
BlackStarSoul: lol just end
BlackStarSoul: so i can report the duo trolls
If from zero, I give this 14 day ban. If you had 14 day ban before, this ismithout a doubt a perma

I've seen a lot worse, but that said I don't think that deserves the push to perma ban. However, this doesn't justify what you were saying; it was still toxic and you shouldn't flame your team. Just ignore them and play. Typing like that has never helped, so why bother type at all.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackStarSoul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R6jhjQMg,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-03T18:51:26.251+0000)
>
> let alone waiste an hour of my life each game lose 15 lp each time.

How does one "waiste" something?

> [{quoted}](name=BlackStarSoul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R6jhjQMg,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-03T18:51:26.251+0000)
>
>while they skate off scott free...

What are these "scotts" and how do I get one?

I play amumu jung even as a tank When i check graph at last i see: I did most dmg i took much dmg
I always lose even my score is so positive like: 12-3
But i dont say anything because Trollers get chance to do something while they r already pissed off about their gameplay . even knowing they were bad af they report and make  people accounts ban who was going good and saying legit ,  Exposing them
